```{r}
#| include: false
library(knitr)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(mapview)

load(file = here('data/metadat.RData'))
load(file = here('data/tempdat.RData'))
```

```{r}
toplo <- tempdat %>% 
  mutate(
    logger = as.numeric(logger)
  )

p <- ggplot(tempdat, aes(x = datetime, y = tempc, color = logger)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  scale_color_viridis_d() +
  theme(
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), 
    legend.position  = 'top'
  ) +
  labs(
    y = 'Temp (C)',
    x = NULL, 
    color = 'Logger'
  )
ggplotly(p)
```

```{r}
mapview(metadat, zcol = 'logger', layer.name = 'Logger')
```
